name: @dadi/queue
description: A lightweight, high-performance task queue built on Node JS and Redis. Includes a broker for queue management and routing, plus a worker framework for processing messages.

scripts.test: snazzy 'lib/*.js' && env NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --report cobertura --report text --report html --report lcov ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Robert Stanford <rs@dadi.co>
